About
Hello!
I'm Zuo Zizhen.
EN CN

I am a product designer in Beijing focusing on designing effective digital products. I have 1+ years of experience in UI/UX design and have online products such as website, application, dashboard. My advantage is good at integrating different skills. I can independently complete the website, iOS application design and development, there are some complete online product case.

I think a great product is the best in every part. In this process, we need the coordination and coordination of all aspects. In the process, I can fully consider the feasibility of development, while controlling the quality of the design from the product and interaction.

我是一名在北京的产品设计师，一直专注于设计有效的数字化产品，以提升企业品牌价值。我拥有1+年视觉/交互设计的经验，有Web、APP、企业后台系统等线上产品。我的优势是善于整合不同技能，我可以独立完成网站、iOS应用的设计及开发，有完整的线上产品案例

我认为一个好的产品需要在各个方面都要做到最好，在这个过程中，需要各个环节的协作和协调。在过程中，我可以充分的从开发的可行性、产品和交互方面来控制设计质量。
